text: "You Wear It Well" is a 1972 song by Rod Stewart. It was taken from his fourth studio album Never a Dull Moment. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom, number 2 in Ireland, number 4 in New Zealand, number 7 in Canada, number 13 in Australia and the United States, number 19 in South Africa and number 35 in Germany. It was covered by The Black Crowes in 2022 for their EP 1972. Category:1972 songs Category:Rod Stewart songs Category:The Black Crowes songs Category:Folk rock songs
title: You Wear It Well
